Description: Limestone ostracon with 7 lines of text on recto and on verso containing a friendship letter.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Monastery of St Phoibammon, Location of the Temple of Mentuhotep I.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (196-200, pl.22)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82886) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82886)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 20 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
